.. _overview-vendor:

Marketplace Vendor Actions
==========================

If you have a vendor account for the Marketplace, you will be able to sell, view, purchase and rate products on the Marketplace.  

The following sub-sections go into detail on the actions related to posting and selling products on the Marketplace. For information on viewing and purchasing products, refer to :ref:`overview-consumer`.

.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:

   vendor-account
   product-create
   product-item-create
   submit-product
   modify-product
   marketingplan-create
   supportplan-create
   pricingplan-create
   product-compatibility
